Description: Body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Stylee pottery heavy chalice; white slip; interior: glazed streaky black; two added white bands; exterior: painted decoration consisting of sphinx (rump and part of tail remaining; added red on rump) to left and lion (one hind leg remaining) to right; dotted crosses and dot rosette as filling ornament.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1561) (phase 2)
